auth.loginDescription: Log in to your account to continue your learning journey.
auth.magicLinkHelper: We'll send a secure login link to your email.
auth.magicLinkSent: Magic link sent to your email
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

auth.excitedToRegister: excited to register with us for the first time. Please
auth.otpSentTo: to get the OTP has been sent to
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: No worries! Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
auth.verifyEmailDescription: Enter the verification code we sent to your email.
auth.createNewPasswordDescription: Your new password must be different from previous passwords.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Follow the steps to reset your password.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.
auth.pleaseEnterEmailForOtp: Please enter your email so we can send you the OTP code!
auth.inThisStepResetPassword: In this step you can reset a new password
auth.successfullyLoggedInMagicLink: Successfully logged in with magic link
auth.magicLinkExpired: We couldn't verify your magic link. It may have expired or already been used.
auth.magicLinkVerified: Your magic link has been verified successfully. You're now logged in.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.passwordMin8: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.mustContainUppercase: Must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.mustContainLowercase: Must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.mustContainNumber: Must contain at least one number
validation.usernameMinLength: Username must be at least 3 characters

slides.interactiveLearningDesc: Engaging learning experiences that simplify technology and encourage active participation.
slides.expertTeachersDesc: Hands-on projects that turn knowledge into real skills through practical application.
slides.trackProgressDesc: Building future-ready minds with essential digital, personal, and life skills.
